name: No Fish To Die
description:
Download Now! WARNING: This game was made in a single weekend for Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam. I did not have time to balance out the difficulty. Be prepared for a challenge.

Your mission is to extract the goldfish who swallowed the microfilm macguffin and bring it back to headquarters alive. Put your puzzle-platforming skills to the test with 10 nefarious levels that will have you dodging heinous lasers, treacherous turrets, and evil pools of lava. Good luck, Agent!

No Fish To Die supports both keyboard and gamepad controls.
